snippet: The availability of Seattle receiver Percy Harvin for the N.F.C. championship game against San Francisco was uncertain as Harvin continued to have concussion testing.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Seattle Seahawks wide receiver Percy Harvin is still going through concussion testing and has not been cleared for the NFC championship game against San Francisco 49ers; other news noted.
lead_paragraph: The availability of Seattle receiver Percy Harvin for the N.F.C. championship game against San Francisco was uncertain as Harvin continued to have concussion testing.

headline.main: Seahawks’ Harvin Is Held Out of Practice
headline.print_headline: Seahawks’ Harvin Is Held Out of Practice
